original_text: And they came to Moses and Aaron and to all the congregation of the people of Israel in the wilderness of Paran, at Kadesh. They brought back word to them and to all the congregation, and showed them the fruit of the land.
korean_text: 바란 광야 가데스에 이르러 모세와 아론과 이스라엘 자손의 온 회중에게 나아와 그들에게 보고하고 그 땅의 과일을 보이고

sentences.original_text: And they came to Moses and Aaron
and to all the congregation of the people of Israel
in the wilderness of Paran, at Kadesh
They brought back word to them
and showed them the fruit of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅의 과실을 그들에게 보여 주었다
